name: Two Lane HighWay
description:
My first game for a game jam

Basics

Use left and right arrow keys to control car 1

Use A and D to control car 2

Avoid the obstacles, and if one car falls off-screen, you lose

The theme of the jam was "two" and within this arcade game, you do your best to control two cars at once on a highway with 2 lanes, and the art-style is 1-bit so you only have 2 colors as well.

Endless mode feels a little unfinished and there was a separate 2-player mode, but those were scrapped due to time constraints. But by all means, feel free to invite a friend to take over one of the cars! 

All assets are mine and were made within the time-frame, besides the font used for the timer.

Yoster Island Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/yoster-island-font.html
